messages: a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:13): yawns
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:13): I don't like writing a personal statement
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:14): I suck at sounding motivated to do physics
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (00:16): Are you motivated to do physics?
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:18): Yeah.
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (00:18): Good - that should make it somewhat easier :-)
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:18): :)
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:18): I still suck at knowing what to write
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:19): I can write stuff that makes me look awesome at comp.sci., but when 1/5th of the places your applying to are comp.sci., that isn't overly relevant
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:19): (the other 4/5th are phys.)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:20): hsivonen: yeah i realised a few weeks ago that making the parser rules normative for a validator might be counter-productive
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:20): hsivonen: it might be that we should change the spec to allow validators to do whatever they like to recover once they hit one error in the parser

f4dfad803df83144a5be86d9bca87678 (00:49): f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220: there is http://www.flickr.com/photos f4dfad803df83144a5be86d9bca87678/2860126641/ but I get "cannot execute binary file". I'll try in the morning after I've sobered up.

f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (00:56): well, that would be the windows executable. I'm guessing you need to use Wine to launch it somehow, though I've no idea how that works
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (00:57): f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220: progressed from LC, i think
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (00:57): Running it under crossover seems like a bad way to get a fair first impression. I guess the animation and scrolling suck less on a native build
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (00:59): it's definitely not good to run on the Mac. It's bad enough being like a windows up, but the integration problems make it largely unusable
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (01:00): s/windows up/windows app/
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (01:00): Which integration problems in particular?
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (01:00): Expose doesn't work
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (01:01): scrolling is bad
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (01:02): Yeah the scrolling is abysmal. Oh well, I guess that's a wine bug.
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (01:03): when you drag tabs off the tab bar, it's quite slow and the transparency is buggered up
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (01:04): if I didn't have Windows in a Virtual machine to run it in, it would be ok, but it's not really worth it, especially since I already have webkit available
